polished_script:
HOOK: Your deal is dying and you have no idea it's happening. [ON-SCREEN: "Your deal is dying"]

BRAND INTRO: "This is D.J. Paris with Keeping It Real Podcast, and this is your agent tip of the day."

SETUP: You know that sick feeling when a deal falls apart and you're blindsided? When your buyer or seller suddenly goes nuclear and you're thinking "where did that come from?" Tim Burrell, a top producer in Raleigh, used to lose deals this exact way. [ON-SCREEN: "Tim Burrell - Top Producer"] The worst part? The warning signs were there the whole time in their emails. But here's what he discovered that changes everything.

[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: He found a way to read their minds before they even know they're angry.

INSIGHT: Tim runs every single negotiation email through ChatGPT with a custom prompt that flags tone shifts before they explode. [ON-SCREEN: "Custom ChatGPT Prompt"] He told me: "AI can flag changes in tone and make the change in attitude and flag that these people are getting mad." It's like having a negotiation radar. [ON-SCREEN: "AI Negotiation Radar"] His prompt rates every email thread on a frustration scale of 1 to 10, and anything above a 6 gets flagged immediately. Most agents miss email number one when the tone shifts. Top producers catch it before they hit send on the reply that kills the deal.

REFRAME: Think about your last deal that imploded. I guarantee there were three emails that week where the frustration was building and you missed every single warning sign. You can literally do this tonight with your current deals.

CTA: "Do you have a deal right now where the tone feels off â€” yes or no?"

CLOSE: "See you next time."
